summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Dawson Street, from Bowen Place to 46th Avenue South; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 88486, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
